fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Budget, Competition, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Youth, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: Activités spatiales : programme H2020 Espace, programme GALILEO/EGNOS, programme Copernicus
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit: Le CNES propose aux pouvoirs publics la politique spatiale de la France et la met en oeuvre dans 5 grands domaines stratégiques : Ariane, les Sciences, l’Observation, les Télécommunications et la Défense.
legal_status: Etablissement public à caractère industriel et commercial
